channel.title: Blackbarrage667 - Pvm/Pvp - Customs - Updates Daily - Active owner and staff
channel.description:
[size=24pt][font=comic sans ms]Blackbarrage667[/font][/size]
[size=18pt][font=times new roman]Links[/font][/size] [spoiler]Homepage-[spoiler]http://blackbarrage667.enjin.com/[/spoiler] Forums-[spoiler]http://blackbarrage667.enjin.com/forum[/spoiler] Download Client Link-[spoiler]https://www.dropbox.com/s/310atwv4tzuxy91/BlackBarrage667.jar?dl=0[/spoiler][/spoiler]
[size=18pt]Thanks for taking the time to look at my post. Im going to try to make this nice sweet and short but with alot of media so you can get a better understand on how my server works and what is all about.We are currently not wanting staff right now. But you are more then welcome to post your staff application on the Forums, Link at top of the page.
We normally have 6+ players on at a time which is good since the server just now opened. [/size] [size=14pt]Features:[/size] [size=12pt]Pvm:[/size] [size=10pt]-Nex -Corp -Godwars -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi bossing -Nomad -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen -Barrelchest -Glacors -Polypores [/size] [size=14pt]PvP:[/size] [size=12pt]-Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking -Donatorzone pvp [/size] [size=14pt]Skilling:[/size] [size=12pt]-Semi low Rate -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed[/size] [size=14pt]Donatorzone: [/size]- [size=12pt]-Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items -Donator Chest (Keys when donate[/size] [size=14pt]Other:[/size] [size=12pt]-Comp cape -Custom quests -Rest area's -Charm collector ring -Ring of wealth and ring of life -Custom NPCS -Rare drop messages if you want your loot shown -Personal kill counter -Bank tabs -Server time on Quest tab [/size] [size=18pt]Staff[/size] [size=14pt]Owner:Tyler Co-Owner:Speedy Admin:None Global mod:None In-game mod:Shank Player support: Vongola_X [/size] [size=18pt]Welcome Log in Page[/size] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/1415w5l.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Hello my name is tyler. Welcome to my Runescape private server This is the Home[/size] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/15s3c3n.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Some of the customs in my bank that are on the server![/size] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2d97llu.png[/img]
[size=18pt]At home, There's a red portal with all the teleports, Below theres media on at the pages of monster![/size] [spoiler][img]http://i58.tinypic.com/157km6v.png[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/iyzt6x.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/f4pobd.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2qia808.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2z57l1z.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/205tb9u.png[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2vmx1so.png[/img][/spoiler]
[size=18pt]I know this isn't the best picture of the shops., But This is a side view of the shops around the bank.[/size] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2woa9a0.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Here below are some pictures of some bosses and what they drop![/size] [size=14pt]K King[/size] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/241qdti.png[/img] [size=14pt]Nex[/size] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/15zrprl.png[/img] [size=14pt]Some bandos but all godwars work and have all drops[/size] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/23i9oyd.png[/img] [size=14pt]Also. Some barrows has all the barrows members fully working and drops Barrows pieces [/size] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/23l00if.png[/img]
[size=18pt]I know most of you know this but there are Curses on here and they are fully working![/size] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/2yuzwgm.png[/img]
[size=18pt]If you computer runs alittle slower then others, That's not a problem Change your settings :)[/size] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/n1ypo2.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Here's some pvp armor works but it does degrade [/size] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2vif1j7.png[/img]
[size=18pt]New and improved Doomed whip... 3 whips put together[/size] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/30nf0gj.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Donatorzone![/size] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2ymvjbk.png[/img] [size=14pt]Donatorshop, Looking to add more things to it really soon[/size] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/jg1vfk.png[/img]
[size=18pt]When you become donator you will have access to the donatorzone and given keys to use on chest.[/size] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/eu4pzk.png[/img] [size=14pt]Here are just some things that are in the chest using 8 keys[/size] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/14kcxl0.png[/img]
[img]http://i58.tinypic.com/1ruh.png[/img]

item.title: Blackbarrage667 - Pvm/Pvp - Customs - Updates Daily - Active owner and staff
item.dc:creator: @Twd1995 Twd1995
item.description:
@Twd1995 wrote:

[size=24pt][font=comic sans ms]Blackbarrage667[/font][/size]

[size=18pt][font=times new roman]Links[/font][/size]
[spoiler]Homepage-[spoiler]http://blackbarrage667.enjin.com/[/spoiler]
Forums-[spoiler]http://blackbarrage667.enjin.com/forum[/spoiler]
Download Client Link-[spoiler]https://www.dropbox.com/s/310atwv4tzuxy91/BlackBarrage667.jar?dl=0[/spoiler][/spoiler]

[size=18pt]Thanks for taking the time to look at my post. Im going to try to make this nice sweet and short but with alot of media so you can get a better understand on how my server works and what is all about.We are currently not wanting staff right now. But you are more then welcome to post your staff application on the Forums, Link at top of the page.

We normally have 6+ players on at a time which is good since the server just now opened.
[/size]
[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
[size=12pt]Pvm:[/size]
[size=10pt]-Nex
-Corp
-Godwars
-Tormented Demons
-Evil Chickens
-Steel Kiwi bossing
-Nomad
-DKS
-Lucien
-Ice titans
-Sea Troll Queen
-Barrelchest
-Glacors
-Polypores
[/size]
[size=14pt]PvP:[/size]
[size=12pt]-Safe pvp
-Clan wars (safe/dangerous)
-Death Match Arena
-Wilderness Pking
-Donatorzone pvp
[/size]
[size=14pt]Skilling:[/size]
[size=12pt]-Semi low Rate
-All skills avaliable
-Max cape rewarded when maxed[/size]
[size=14pt]Donatorzone:
[/size]-
[size=12pt]-Donator skilling zone
-Skilling benefits
-Donator Only Items
-Donator Chest (Keys when donate[/size]
[size=14pt]Other:[/size]
[size=12pt]-Comp cape
-Custom quests
-Rest area’s
-Charm collector ring
-Ring of wealth and ring of life
-Custom NPCS
-Rare drop messages if you want your loot shown
-Personal kill counter
-Bank tabs
-Server time on Quest tab
[/size]
[size=18pt]Staff[/size]
[size=14pt]Owner:Tyler
Co-Owner:Speedy
Admin:None
Global mod:None
In-game mod:Shank
Player support: Vongola_X
[/size]
[size=18pt]Welcome Log in Page[/size]

[size=18pt]Hello my name is tyler. Welcome to my Runescape private server This is the Home[/size]

[size=18pt]Some of the customs in my bank that are on the server![/size]

[size=18pt]At home, There’s a red portal with all the teleports, Below theres media on at the pages of monster![/size]
[spoiler]





[/spoiler]

[size=18pt]I know this isn’t the best picture of the shops., But This is a side view of the shops around the bank.[/size]

[size=18pt]Here below are some pictures of some bosses and what they drop![/size]
[size=14pt]K King[/size]

[size=14pt]Nex[/size]

[size=14pt]Some bandos but all godwars work and have all drops[/size]

[size=14pt]Also. Some barrows has all the barrows members fully working and drops Barrows pieces [/size]

[size=18pt]I know most of you know this but there are Curses on here and they are fully working![/size]

[size=18pt]If you computer runs alittle slower then others, That’s not a problem Change your settings :)[/size]

[size=18pt]Here’s some pvp armor works but it does degrade [/size]

[size=18pt]New and improved Doomed whip… 3 whips put together[/size]

[size=18pt]Donatorzone![/size]

[size=14pt]Donatorshop, Looking to add more things to it really soon[/size]

[size=18pt]When you become donator you will have access to the donatorzone and given keys to use on chest.[/size]

[size=14pt]Here are just some things that are in the chest using 8 keys[/size]
